name: Lesser Mummy Lord
languages: the languages it knew in life

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mummy attacks twice with its rotting fist.

action.name: Rotting Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit Your spellcasting ability modifier} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) necrotic damage. The mummy lord regains hit points equal to half the damage dealt.

action.name: Blinding Dust
entries: Blinding dust and sand swirls magically around the mummy lord. Each creature within 5 feet of the mummy lord must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the end of the creature's next turn.

action.name: Dreadful Glare
entries: The mummy lord targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can see the mummy lord, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw against this magic or take ({@damage 3d4 + 3}) and become {@condition frightened} until the end of the mummy's next turn. If the target fails the saving throw by 5 or more, it is also {@condition paralyzed} for the same duration. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Dreadful Glare of all mummies and mummy lords for the next 24 hours.
